name: The Asylum Incident
storyline: After a horrific incident in the asylum, Mr. Fors sets out to get revenge, He finds out he is too weak, and spends time overcoming some tough challenges he's faced before and some completely new, all while not forgetting his main goal: revenge.
summary: Mr. Fors sets out to get revenge after a horrific incident happens in his asylum. Mr. Fors needs to overcome some tough challenges with different mechanics before finally getting a chance at revenge.
